Class MCTSTuner

java.lang.Object
AI.mcts.Steps.Tuner.MCTSTuner
public final class MCTSTuner extends Object
A hyperparameter tuning utility for MCTS MovePruner heuristics. This class performs random search over the hyperparameter space to find configurations that improve MCTS performance.

The tuner supports two modes:

  • Full random search: samples all parameters including exploration constant
  • Per-C search: fixes the exploration constant and tunes other parameters

Configurations are evaluated by playing matches between base MCTS and optimized MCTS with color-swapping to ensure fairness.

  • Constructor Details

    • MCTSTuner

      public MCTSTuner(int boardSize, int iterations, int gamesPerSide, long seed)
      Constructs an MCTSTuner with the specified parameters and random seed.
      Parameters:
      boardSize - the size of the Hex board for testing
      iterations - the number of MCTS iterations per move
      gamesPerSide - the number of games to play for each color assignment
      seed - the random seed for reproducible results

    • MCTSTuner

      public MCTSTuner(int boardSize, int iterations, int gamesPerSide)
      Constructs an MCTSTuner with the specified parameters and a random seed based on the current time.
      Parameters:
      boardSize - the size of the Hex board for testing
      iterations - the number of MCTS iterations per move
      gamesPerSide - the number of games to play for each color assignment

  • Method Details

    • sampleRandomConfig

      private PrunerConfig sampleRandomConfig()
      Samples a completely random configuration including all parameters and the exploration constant.

      Parameter ranges:

      • threshold: [0.7, 1.0]
      • centralityWeight: [0.0, 1.0]
      • biasScale: [0.02, 0.08]
      • spWeight: [0.0, 0.2]
      • cExploration: [0.5, 2.0]
      Returns:
      a randomly sampled PrunerConfig

    • sampleRandomConfigForC

      private PrunerConfig sampleRandomConfigForC(double cExploration)
      Samples a random configuration with a fixed exploration constant. All other parameters are randomly sampled within their ranges.

      Parameter ranges:

      • threshold: [0.3, 1.0]
      • centralityWeight: [0.0, 1.0]
      • biasScale: [0.02, 0.08]
      • spWeight: [0.0, 0.2]
      Parameters:
      cExploration - the fixed exploration constant to use
      Returns:
      a randomly sampled PrunerConfig with the specified exploration constant

    • evaluateConfig

      public double evaluateConfig(PrunerConfig cfg, boolean printMatches)
      Evaluates a configuration by playing a color-swapped tournament between base MCTS and optimized MCTS. Each agent plays both colors to eliminate first-player advantage bias.
      Parameters:
      cfg - the configuration to evaluate
      printMatches - whether to print individual match results
      Returns:
      the win rate percentage of the optimized configuration against the base

    • randomSearch

      public void randomSearch(int trials)
      Performs a random search over the entire hyperparameter space including the exploration constant. Evaluates the specified number of random configurations and reports the best one found.
      Parameters:
      trials - the number of random configurations to evaluate

    • randomSearchPerC

      public void randomSearchPerC(double[] cValues, int trialsPerC)
      Performs random search for each fixed exploration constant value. For each C value, samples and evaluates multiple random configurations of the other parameters. Reports the best configuration overall.
      Parameters:
      cValues - array of exploration constant values to test
      trialsPerC - number of random configurations to try for each C value
